EmailTemplate.description: This Email gets sent to DCS once a Case has been assigned to a user
EmailTemplate.name: DCS Case Assigned
EmailTemplate.subject: New DCS Case from {!Case.CreatedBy}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi DCS!
You have a new case awaiting your expertise!
Please click on the link below to view the details of the Case
{!Case.Link}
